author: jimmygchen
content:
Hi all, I might not be able to make the call tonight, sorry. I have been on leave so I don't have much to update. But looking forward to get back to this on Thursday.

<@498331483732312075>  identified an issue in Lighthouse where we penalise peers sending us columns after we perform reconstruction - this likely contributed to LH supernode peering issues. We'll submit a fix for this and retest. Thanks ğŸ™
